SEARCH
Package com.bws.jdistil.core.configuration

Class ConfigurationManager

java.lang.Object
com.bws.jdistil.core.configuration.ConfigurationManager
public class ConfigurationManager extends Object
Configuration manager used by core framework classes to retrieve action, field, page, and object binding related information.
Author:
Bryan Snipes
